Package com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api.model

Class RVSqlPDSDataSource

java.lang.Object
com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api.model.RVDashboardDataSource
com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api.model.RVSqlBasedDataSource
com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api.model.RVSqlPDSDataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
RVMySqlDataSource, RVPostgresDataSource, RVSqlServerDataSource
public abstract class RVSqlPDSDataSource
extends RVSqlBasedDataSource
Base class for SQL-based data sources supporting "Server-side Processing".

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RVSqlPDSDataSource()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean getProcessDataOnServerDefaultValue()
    Sets the default value for "Process Data on Server" option for this data source, the end user can still change the value, unless setProcessDataOnServerReadOnly(boolean) is true.
    boolean getProcessDataOnServerReadOnly()
    When set to true the user will not be allowed to change the value for "Process Data on Server" option and the default value will be used.
    boolean setProcessDataOnServerDefaultValue​(boolean value)
    Sets the default value for "Process Data on Server" option for this data source, the end user can still change the value, unless setProcessDataOnServerReadOnly(boolean) is true.
    boolean setProcessDataOnServerReadOnly​(boolean value)
    When set to true the user will not be allowed to change the value for "Process Data on Server" option and the default value will be used.

    • setProcessDataOnServerDefaultValue

      public boolean setProcessDataOnServerDefaultValue​(boolean value)
      Sets the default value for "Process Data on Server" option for this data source, the end user can still change the value, unless setProcessDataOnServerReadOnly(boolean) is true. It defaults to true.
